content.description: Can aim at the nearest enemy and act like a boomerang.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Clover** to make **Heaven Sword**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Can be unlocked by finding a Rosary, which drops from breaking light sources.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Damage +10 
(3) Speed +25%, Area +10% 
(4) Projectiles +1 
(5) Damage +10 
(6) Speed +25, Area +10% 
(7) Projectiles +1 
(8) Damage +10

content.title: Cross
